channel.title: New Patch made game boring
channel.description:
Hi,
I am a ToL player who plays a decent amount. This new patch made many classes SUPER boring.
Phys with No DK? super boring. No CW fix? CW super boring Noble? Super boring Psychic to Mystic? Wtf? Now Mystic has a bunch of work to do...super boring. Knight still a suicide class? Boring
A few things were nice, but wtf m8? We want easy stuff to do. DK was FUN. Psychic talking to dead was FUN. Noble, never fun, CW never fun.
Dying Night 1 is Never Fun.
I like a lot of the changes like to King and UI and Emotes, but fix the boring classes so you don't want to automatically suicide

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
3DT_CheesyKnives:

Conduit shouldnt be used for claiming. If people are claiming they’re doing it wrong

Really? everyone I have ever conduited claim their classes, post their logs, and talk about what they will be doing

3DT_CheesyKnives:

And no , since timezones are a thing i wouldnt even know its 2am where you are

lol, forgot they existed xd

Read full topic

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Actually, I found many people stayed after death. Of course, it doesn’t happen now, since you can’t do anything while dead.

DK was super swingy. But Call of the Dead wasn’t unreliable. And you had your normal abilities even if everyone did leave. For the most part, people would stay at least long enough to see if there was a Psychic.

Read full topic

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
3DT_CheesyKnives:

I do believe Maid Spy is a bit of luck , though.

Yes it does have luck and strat in it

3DT_CheesyKnives:

I agree with you on DK. It was too op , and too swingy late-game.

Yup

3DT_CheesyKnives:

They removed dead interaction becuase of how unreliable it was. I don’t understand why people complain when typically players left as soon as they died. I do believe Mystic should have Conduit as a main ability , as it makes them function differently from the Prince , a neighbourizer.

While I think it would be nice for conduit to get 1 or 2 extra charges I don’t think it should be the main ability since about 2 people each night will be claiming which is a bit OP.

Edit: don’t think I’m a werido since it almost 2 am in the morning xd

Read full topic

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Firelitten:

How does it work for if a Pyschic messages somone with private minds…

I can’t confirm for noble, but a possessor sees the whispers entirely normally if they used their power to make the psychic mystic kill someone.

item.title: New Patch made game boring

I do believe Maid Spy is a bit of luck , though.

I agree with you on DK. It was too op , and too swingy late-game.

They removed dead interaction becuase of how unreliable it was. I don’t understand why people complain when typically players left as soon as they died. I do believe Mystic should have Conduit as a main ability , as it makes them function differently from the Prince , a neighbourizer.

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
TXTRAINING:

Noble I can’t stand because I have to randomly choose who to pick to spy on for whispers and if they don’t whisper anything, I can’t do anything. I like reading log books but Spy is very boring.

Strats my friend, strats! If someone just whispered to someone on that day they’re likely to whisper to them again especially if the person who was whispered replied

TXTRAINING:

Physician was my favorite class. I could heal and also contribute to a death of a player. Now we have 1 innoculate; then just heal? I can’t really make any decisions, whereas when I reanimated a dk, I could swing the game.

DK was sadly too OP, also I find phys’s new day ability amazing, wish herb could a nerfed version of that

TXTRAINING:

Mystic is powerful but it’s so much work. When you could talk to the dead, they could give you information and you could read. Now as Mystic you’re super investigator and then trying to link 2 people. It’s like a prince, but more work and now no information from dead. Too much effort.

I’m not liking that they removed call of the dead but it did have some problems, it isn’t fun when a poss can’t use their abilities, also I find it less effort now because I don’t have to write what the dead say every night

Read full topic

Every other change improved the game.

item.title: New Patch made game boring
item.dc:creator: Riley_Sinn
item.description:
The point of Neut king was to try your best to find evils in the early game, and if it failed and you felt things were swapping, start stalling until you suddenly ex a confirmed BD. It was a highly skilled class that took someone that really understood how to play it, to win.

Removing it is really unfortunate. Like many changes in this patch in my opinion. It dumbs the game down so the younger crowd can play.

Read full topic
